sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnextrlhrinfo ( event_id , extrl_hr_id , sexdstn_code , extrl_hr_nm , occp_ty_code , psitn_instt_nm , brthdy , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #eventId# , #extrlHrId# , #sexdstnCode# , #extrlHrNm# , #occpTyCode# , #psitnInsttNm# , #brthdy# , #areaNo# , #middleTelno# , #endTelno# , #emailAdres# , SYSDATE() , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnextrlhrinfo SET event_id = #eventId# , extrl_hr_id = #extrlHrId# , sexdstn_code = #sexdstnCode# , extrl_hr_nm = #extrlHrNm# , occp_ty_code = #occpTyCode# , psitn_instt_nm = #psitnInsttNm# , brthdy = #brthdy# , area_no = #areaNo# , middle_telno = #middleTelno# , end_telno = #endTelno# , email_adres = #emailAdres# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND event_id = #eventId# AND extrl_hr_id = #extrlHrId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND event_id = #eventId# AND extrl_hr_id = #extrlHrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT event_id , extrl_hr_id , sexdstn_code , extrl_hr_nm , occp_ty_code , psitn_instt_nm , brthdy , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE event_id = #eventId# AND extrl_hr_id = #extrlHrId#

SELECT event_id , extrl_hr_id , sexdstn_code , extrl_hr_nm , occp_ty_code , psitn_instt_nm , brthdy , area_no , middle_telno , end_telno , email_adres , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE 1=1
event_id = #searchKeyword#
extrl_hr_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY event_id DESC , extrl_hr_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnextrlhrinfo WHERE 1=1
event_id = #searchKeyword#
extrl_hr_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
